name: Android
body:
Install

For the Profiling integration to work, you must have the Sentry Android package (minimum version 6.0.0). You can choose between automatic and manual installation methods, using Sentryâ€™s Android Gradle Plugin (shown below). Learn more about installation methods in our full documentation.

buildscript {
  repositories {
    mavenCentral()
  }
}
plugins {
  id "io.sentry.android.gradle" version "4.2.0"
}
